description: Statistics overlay section with background image

title.description: Main title centered over background (e.g., 'ابدأ رحلة عملك نحو مستقبل أكثر استدامة وأمانا')

notes: Statistics box has gradient background (green gradient)
Background image covers top 2/3, white background on bottom 1/3
Grid layout: 2 columns on mobile, 4 columns on desktop
Stats are separated by vertical borders
Typical stats: +15 materials, +350k suppliers, +15k cities, +15 satisfaction rate
